website_summaries.verdict: Small design that can make chaffle sticks makes this model a fun alternative to a traditional waffle maker.
pros: Has nonstick waffle plates in 4 sections for making dip-friendly chaffles
Small unit doesn't take up much space
cons: Some makers stopped working after a few uses
Doesn't get as hot as some competitors, so it takes a little longer to cook

customer_reviews.title: Great Maker for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size waffles for me. I would recommend using less batter so there’s no overflow. 1/4 cup will make a perfect (a bit undersized) waffle but no spillage. 4-1/2 minutes is perfect time to cook them
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: first off, there was no measuring scoop as listed in the manual, so I didn't know how much batter to use. The batter for the apple cinnamon waffles turned out like glue, so after thinning it out the batter still only made 2 of 4 rows of waffles. And if I added more batter, it just poured out the sides and front of the waffle maker. Extremely disappointed in product
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Toddler win.
customer_reviews.text: My toddlers think I'm awesome. This stepped my breakfast game up incredibly well. Update: It broke and no longer heats after 6 uses. Super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Great little maker!
customer_reviews.text: I, too, was fearful of the bad reviews, but thought that, for the price, it would be a good risk to take. And I'm so glad I did! This is a super cute unit, we made gluten free waffle sticks. Just watch how much batter you put in it, and time it to about 4 minutes. It wipes down cleanly as long as you spray it with oil.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Breslin

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for Chaffles.
customer_reviews.text: There is chaffle craze in the Keto community right now and my sister and I thought this would be great to experiment with recipes in. Not so much!! I’m sure it’s awesome for regular waffles, but then sections are a little too deep for chaffles to turn out right. Stick to the Dash Mini for chaffles, my keto friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!  GET ONE!!
customer_reviews.text: It's small and easy to use. I immediately tested it by making 3 sets of waffles, timed them differently to see how long it takes to make the perfect waffles for my husband and me. They all turned out perfect and edible, golden brown (how I like them) to dark brown (how my husband likes them). Not one time did the waffles stick. So easy to remove with a fork. Easy to wipe clean. And the perfect size for an apartment size kitchen. I highly recommend this gem.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Wong Lane

customer_reviews.title: So much more than waffles!
customer_reviews.text: We use this thing almost every day it seems in our house! Something about eating food in "stick" form is just more fun for kiddos. It's become my go to way to make French toast. 4 minutes and you have 4 perfectly cooked "sticks" (although it's better with thicker sliced bread FYI). We make pancake dippers with it, macaroni and cheese bites, hasbrowns, and occasionally waffles. It's fool proof, easy to clean (though it would be AMAZING if the plates came off to wash), and it's small so you can toss it in any cabinet you have to store it. I will never stop telling people, especially parents, to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This works so well! I have been wanting one since my grandma gave our old one to my cousins, since they used it more. The one thing that disappointed me is that it didn't come with a measuring cup like it said it would. So I had to guess but I guessed too much and it ended up overflowing and wouldn't close. Other than that, it makes great waffles and fast too! Takes about 4-5 minutes. I am glad these are so cheap now! Glad to have it in my life again.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen gadget ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the coolest gadget that I have bought in a while! I have a daughter that loves Eggos and thought it would be better if I made the waffles instead, I was right! I just completed about 40 waffle sticks in one sitting and they turn out fantastic- we started off eating them faster than I could make them. I think it’s great that it comes with a couple recipes of different waffle sticks to make I’m excited to try the others we did the basic buttermilk waffles. Love this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: If you want golden brown thoroughly cooked crispy waffles this is not the machine for you. I got this for my kids for Xmas and just busted it out in April (hey, quarantine, hey!) it was supposed to come with a measuring cup and mine did not. It seems no matter how long I leave the batter in there the waffles are not consistently crispy throughout, and the insides are a little gooey for my taste. It’s kind of a weak appliance. Kids prob wouldn’t mind them but I think they’re eh.
customer_reviews.author: L. Arakelian

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: It was just not what expected. Cook time not accurate. Had to stand there and keep checking. Thought it would be fun for older grandchildren. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn bond

customer_reviews.title: Good product but BAD vendor!
customer_reviews.text: The product works just fine. just like described. HOWEVER, mine arrived without proper seal and it was obvious from the way everything was wrapped that it was a returned product, or previously used. In addition, the measuring spoon is missing as well. I will buy the product again, but will NOT buy from this vendor!
customer_reviews.author: JJW

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my babycakes waffle iron. It's as cute as can be! I've read the manual from cover to cover oh, it says that there is an included measuring cup, but it did not include a measuring cup. I wonder if anybody knows how much batter to put in at one time? this is an awesome little device! I made waffles from a box mix today using 1/3 cup of batter in the waffle maker. The waffles came out wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Robinette

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use waffle stick maker for a bargain price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and makes really great waffle sticks. Clean up is simple. I make a batch of waffle sticks on weekends for my partner’s breakfast. He pulls them out of the fridge and pops them in the toaster oven. I don’t like having appliances that only serve one purpose but it is very small and doesn’t take up much room, it works great, easy to use and clean and honestly, the price makes it a bargain considering how well it works. A+ recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Just tried it out this morning and it was great! I have to figure out how to put the right amount of batter in so it doesnt spill out and will fill all 4 sticks but its not the fault of the waffle maker
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Limp waffles
customer_reviews.text: Purchased July 2018. I never could find a recipe that worked with this little unit. Never crisp. Always limp. I gave up. Maybe you will have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: AZMOM

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Cute little waffle maker . I also used it to make “French toast sticks” !
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an office white elephant Christmas party. I made it into a gift basket with some waffle mix and syrup. It was a huge hit with my coworkers.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia B.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this at first because my family does not actually eat waffles often but boy am I glad I did! It is so cute and makes the best little waffle sticks that we have actually used it more times to make waffles since buying it than we ever have. Worth it, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Payton

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandchildren to use at their homes because they all love waffle sticks. The feedback from my sons is that it’s a fun and delicious activity to do with the kids but that it is messy and could be hard to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Karen C

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: it's fine for $10 but i probably wouldnt buy it again. the waffles arent thick and fluffy like the pics and all the recipes call for an "included measuring cup" which isn't included. it's a cute niche thing but don't get your hopes up too high
customer_reviews.author: Sonni

customer_reviews.title: Fun waffle stick maker
customer_reviews.text: Fun waffle maker. It's a bit messy but easy to clean. My kids would rather have the sticks and dunk them than pouring syrup all over regular waffles, which makes them pretty soggy if not eaten right away. This way they can take their time with the waffle sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it , but use commercial batter, I used my recipe but they became soggy after a few minutes, then I tried a commercial one, and they turned out perfect .
customer_reviews.author: Tiby

customer_reviews.title: Fun shapes, very small, and messy.
customer_reviews.text: My kids like the fun shapes. However, the waffle maker is supposed to come with a measuring scoop, which it does not. You need that measuring scoop to get the amount right. A little too much makes a huge mess and too little doesn't cover the waffle iron. I have cleaned up so many messes that I am getting sick of it. As an adult, I can usually guess the right amount, but my nine year old, who loves to cook, can't.
customer_reviews.author: bk32002

customer_reviews.title: Unplug
customer_reviews.text: Just remember to unplug. There isn’t an off switch. I left on for 24 hours and it was HOT.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie m.

customer_reviews.title: Sunday is waffle day
customer_reviews.text: perfect for the little cooker in the house. Our daughter makes breakfast in the morning and is on a waffle kick, this did the trick made it fun and easy to cook perfectly and eat, heck the sticks are for kicks. eggs and waffles now we moved from pancakes (YES!)
customer_reviews.author: MikeSmith

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bariatric Patients
customer_reviews.text: I have had bariatric surgery, so it’s hard for me to justify making waffles in a regular waffle iron. This thing is perfect, because this way the portions are already smaller!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little appliance . Makes goid , crispy waffle sticks !!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a bit bigger ..! My BAD .. Otherwise SWEET little appliance . Small enough that it doesn’t take up much cabinet space if you want to leave out for the weekend / or just leave it out for that matter ..
customer_reviews.author: Tammie P.

customer_reviews.title: I love this little thing and I use it almost exclusively ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing and I use it almost exclusively when making breakfast for my daughter. I haven't used my regular waffle iron in months as this one is so much faster. It is also easier to prepare only what is needed. During the week, I usually fix 8 sticks for my daughter (equivalent to about 2 Eggo waffles) and more on the weekend for the whole family to enjoy. I am buying one for my sister also.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Bug

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean, all of what you expect. Wish it was just a bit wider to make more at once. Kind of hard to keep warm while making the rest for us to eat together. My one issue was it didn't come with the measuring utensil that shows on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Roderiques

customer_reviews.title: Don’t overfill!
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute, although you really have to watch how much you put in. I’ve overfilled it several times and it oozes out the front and sides.
customer_reviews.author: ZoZo

customer_reviews.title: Yummy easy waffle maker.
customer_reviews.text: This waffle maker is nice for the kids to use. It is not easy to clean, but can be washed in the sink if careful. Cleaning should always be done when it is cooled and it should be given ample time to dry, just in case water gets into areas where it can damage the unit or cause other problem. The kids use it all the time. I would suggest purchasing small plastic condiment bottles to pour the batter into the waffle maker.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Grodsky

customer_reviews.title: Works good but hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Very cute works great but very hard to really get it clean. It does not come apart so you can’t submerge it to really clean it good. Some things stick really bad and others do not. Not sure why but I do use it often with good experiences and not so good.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not real sure
customer_reviews.text: I can’t be completely 100% accurate on this one maybe if we were able to use regular pancake or waffle mix but we have an egg allergy and my dad are stuck but the concept is cute if you leave it in longer than the crisp up more
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but definitely hard to clean. I bought this so I could make homemade waffle sticks for my kids. Most definitely dislike cleaning it, since the waffles doesn't come off easily when it overflows.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift! Works Great, it's fast and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter's Mother's day gift. She has two small children and was making waffles and cutting them every day for them. So when I saw this, I knew I had to get it for her. Their family loves it, and they use it all the time. So I bought another one for myself and I use it every Sunday .
customer_reviews.author: FairyQueenDani / DaniMom22

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy and crispy waffles!!'
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this waffle maker! My waffles are fluffy in the inside and crisp on the outside. Here's what I learned... One tablespoon per section, flip waffle cooker upside down once I'm done pouring and never use non stick spray( it makes them crispy without it) oh and they freeze wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mil

customer_reviews.title: Fun, totally worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Damn if I don’t love this thing. Price is great, even if it only lasts a year for under 20 bucks this makes great little waffle sticks. Two year old loves it. We use recipe provided and jiffy mix, never had a problem
customer_reviews.author: Darcy essmyer

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: I use 1/4 cup of batter to fill the four wells. I did not get a measuring cup with it. I am wondering if anyone did. I cook for 4 minutes. I bought two of them so I could make more sticks at a time. Love this
customer_reviews.author: Love Shopping

customer_reviews.title: Great waffle stix for dunking!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super fun and quick way to make waffle stix! Truly is no stick, no spray needed. The stix are a perfect for dunking! My kids love them! Heats up and cooks quickly, cleans with a wet cloth, and stores well. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy M.

customer_reviews.title: Making breakfast fun
customer_reviews.text: Cute. Small and compact. Bought it for a gift and they loved it. Also makes cake pops, donuts and small waffles. Looks like a Sunday funday breakfast appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Dara Holl

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Small, difficult to clean, not worth the novelty of a mini waffle maker
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: Gift for a friend broke after 2nd use. Save your money and get a real one. Or just toss the cash in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Christine castellani

customer_reviews.title: absolutely does not work
customer_reviews.text: cooks one side and not the other, but it was $10 so I wasn't expecting much. Just a little disappointed cause it's cute
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Such a great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun, not just for the little ones. Grandma loves it too. There was no cup with mine. So it's not easy knowing how much batter to use. I've did a lot of cleaning up. But we'll worth it.
customer_reviews.author: candy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I used the blueberry muffin pack from the grocery store and made them with the waffle maker and it was delicious and it was so fast!
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Falcon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get hot enough to cook well
customer_reviews.text: I attempted make waffles two different times with a basic waffle recipe and was disappointed. This waffle maker does not cook well. The waffles come out soft. I am thinking this model does not get hot enough. My regular waffle maker does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Nitschke

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I love it , my son loves waffle, it’s very easy to use , make those sticks shapes which is a perfect size for a child and even an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Sarkan & Janna

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this thing. It’s a little hard to clean and I can’t seem to make the right sized waffles without it spilling out. The directions say to use the included scooper, but I didn’t get one.
customer_reviews.author: Melynda Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with measuring cup! Impossible to figure out how much to add, and an absolute nightmare to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: review
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved the product, worked great and in really good condition. A big thank you to the seller for this wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Janeyce

customer_reviews.title: Pays for itself right away
customer_reviews.text: Make multiple batters put them in the freezer, great quick good breakfast on the go or for little ones. Only takes 30 seconds from freezer to ready
customer_reviews.author: Mary Steinfelt

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Idea of this is nice & cute but it’s seriously a pain in the butt to use So much spillage & it’s so hard to clean
customer_reviews.author: Mala

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the waffle stick maker. I bought two of them for gifts for my daughters. One of my girls used hers and loved it. She even posted pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Marie L. Thrailkill

customer_reviews.title: easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love the baby cake waffle stick maker. I didn’t get the measuring cup which would have made using it a little better
customer_reviews.author: book

customer_reviews.title: If you love waffles but prefer smaller size-these are perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing wrong is that you have to be careful of is the top doesn't stay open and you could get burned if you aren't careful.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Knipmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my 3yo he's been so happy having waffle sticks in the morning. I'm a little bummed it didn't come with a measuring cup but my husband has found the perfect fill point and we've had fantastic waffle sticks since. I can't wait to try out some of the recipes in the instruction book too!!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: could make a little deeper ones. kinda shallow. but works as stated
customer_reviews.author: Bill W.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was right on time. Works amazing. Highly suggest for little kids. My 3 year old loved having waffle sticks for breakfast, he has asked for them every morning since we got it! A little difficult to clean, but worth it at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Lisle

customer_reviews.title: Everything works great, waffles came out perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got this in the mail yesterday and was so excited to use it. Everything works great, waffles came out perfect. My only issue was trying to figure out how much batter each set of waffles was supposed to get. I used trial and error and it wasn't that difficult to figure out, but the instructions that and with the maker say to use "measuring cup provided" and there was no measuring cup. Otherwise great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Fast easy and delicious
customer_reviews.text: Easy to store clean up was a little tricky the cord is not removable so we hand wash it, the box says it is not recommended to submerge in water. The batter got into the cracks and it was a little tough cleaning it out but it makes great waffle sticks fast, small chocolate chips are a favorite add in to the batter
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Good little waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: Very useful. Makes great waffles. I wish the plates were removable for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: R.Fagon

customer_reviews.title: Super cute works great!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute small and works amazing, doesn’t get too hot. Best used when batter is put in squirt bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old got this for Xmas. Super easy to use and clean. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: idriveavw

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Cute concept and product. Doesn’t let the waffles get very thick which I should’ve read into more.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: but cute and easy. I will only use it once in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Its going to be a little harder to clean than expected, but cute and easy. I will only use it once in a while. If you make a lot of waffles, you need something a little different.
customer_reviews.author: SpedTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little guy. I use it to make waffle sticks for my kiddo and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hall

customer_reviews.title: Waffle maker.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for me. My granddaughter loved it so much I ended up giving it to her. Great for use in small apartment for single person
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not convenient
customer_reviews.text: No on/off button. Randomly turns on and off when cooking. Took forever to make 4 waffle sticks. It would be easier to make waffles and cut them.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney S

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Great for my kids. My packsaid it came with a measuring scoop for the batter but it didn’t so it was a bit trial and error to figure out how much to use
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 3

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great waffle maker! Very easy to use and clean. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I love that the waffle is 4 sticks where i dont have to cut it up for my son. He can just dip them and no mess after. Its great.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Malloy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like this too much
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like this too much. Batter didn't cook evenly and it's hard to get them out. Wish it had a timer on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Missing instructions
customer_reviews.text: Box said to not use without reading instructions but mine didn’t come with any
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: So freaking cute easy to use. I’d use 2/3 of batter. Otherwise it will spill
customer_reviews.author: Marisol

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: I do not prefer this. Does not come with any suggestions how much to poor. It never seems to heat hot enough for a slight crunch on them.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Makes great dipping waffles
customer_reviews.text: takes A little longer to make but makes light fluffy waffle sticks. My kids love them and they’re convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Tina B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This works very well!! I was so happy I bought another one!! So cute and affordable
customer_reviews.author: NOYB

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but one item was missing.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this waffle maker. Waffle sticks can be made ahead of time and frozen for quick breakfasts. Just warm some butter and syrup in a cup in the micro, toast em up, and your good to go. Dip away! Would have given 5 stars, but the measuring cup that was supposed to come with it wasn't in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Wisniewski

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money, ordered for Christmas brunch...I tried it out early and it works great for kids and those that don't want a big waffle.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda T.

customer_reviews.title: Super gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love this. Works great. Easy to clean. And make drinkable waffles
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Ease of Use
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good appliance. The package says to use measuring cup provided in the instructional manual and I did not receive one. It is item #8 on page 4.
customer_reviews.author: Jennean Dumaplin

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: Measuring cup that is suppose to be included wasn't there.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Killian

customer_reviews.title: Instructions missing, but found them online
customer_reviews.text: Please disregard the previous message below - I found the instructions online. This arrived today without instructions. It looks like it had been returned previously and then mailed out again. Are the instructions online or should I return the product and reorder? There was not an option for product support or I would have used that option.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Ratekin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and good if you are cooking for children
customer_reviews.author: Crystal M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up to repeated use
customer_reviews.text: Originally this waffle marker worked great, however, after the first ten uses it began to stick extremely bad. I'm super disappointed because it was making perfect waffle sticks, but the non-stick didn't hold up at all (& before you ask, yes, I followed to care instructions).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Hard to clean with a power plug attached! Over flows easy prob due to size but love it
customer_reviews.author: nichole lengen

customer_reviews.title: Waffle iron great for more than waffles too!
customer_reviews.text: Small, but for two people, it is perfect! We use for more than waffles! Like cookie dough! Yum, a couple of crispy cookies in a very few minutes! Cooks waffles crispy too!
customer_reviews.author: debra in HSV

customer_reviews.title: Kids love the sticks
customer_reviews.text: Makes great waffles quickly. But one must cut them apart. Kids love the sticks. MEASURING CUP IS NOT INCLUDED!
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Waffle stick maker
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves the waffle sticks when I make them on his visits.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Romack

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my daughter-in-law for her and our grandbabies. She seemed to like it.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, fast, and fun!
customer_reviews.text: This has saved my life, as a single mother of three picky kids 9, 5, and 3. This is a fast and easy breakfast for weekends and busy mornings.. I make up a box of Jiffy muffin mix and it makes the perfect amount for my kids.. I've not have any trouble or problems in the time I've had it and I am looking into buying more from this company... cup cakes or donuts next!
customer_reviews.author: kbrunell8

customer_reviews.title: is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so my daughter who has a lot of food allergies could have the same foods as the other kids at school. It cooks evenly, is easy to clean, there was no sticking, and the waffles turned out well. My daughter loves that she is able to have the same food as the other kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi3939

customer_reviews.title: like the kinds you buy in stores
customer_reviews.text: I'm strictly Gluten Free and I really miss having waffle sticks, like the kinds you buy in stores. This waffle stick maker fills my craving for a childhood classic while also being easy to use and clean. Also kids will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Krauss

customer_reviews.title: Love waffle sticks and this was so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This worked excellently! Love waffle sticks and this was so easy to use. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: A little small but works well
customer_reviews.text: It works well, but it's just so small that it takes 0.5h to finish all the batter. It's not the product's problem though as it's supposed to be mini. I just wish it's just a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: Shuang Chen

customer_reviews.title: like some do
customer_reviews.text: Make gluten free egg free waffle sticks for my daughter. Machine works perfectly. They dont burn either, like some do.

customer_reviews.text: This makes great waffles! I have been following directions and the waffles are coming out easily.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for delicious waffles.
customer_reviews.text: OMG, so love this waffle iron. My 4 year old loves being an assistant and definitely likes the results. Waffles are great and a wonderful way to incorporate her budding skills and toddler appetite.
customer_reviews.author: Emily123

product_meta.title: Babycakes Waffle Stick Maker, Mini
product_meta.description: Make Delicious Waffle Sticks in Minutes Bake 4 waffle sticks in a blink with Babycakes Waffle Sticks Maker. Waffles are more fun on a stick with your favorite topping, syrup or chocolate for a sweet treat. Nonstick coating makes cleanup easy. The waffle maker features 500 watts of power and ready light, convenient cord wrap and latching handle. ETL Listed. Nonskid rubber feet. 6\" x 8.5\" x 3.5\".
feature_bullets: Latching Handle and Non-Skid Rubber Feet
